subject: URGENT: Checkout 500 errors
body: Guys, the checkout page is throwing 500 Internal Server Errors for all users in the EU region. Traffic is dropping fast. Can someone jump on the bridge?

subject: Re: Friday lunch?
body: Sounds good to me. Are there any vegetarian options at that place? Also, Dave said he might run a bit late.

subject: Help - Locked out again
body: Hi IT, I swear I typed the right password but it says my account is locked. Can you unlock it? I have a meeting in 10 mins.

subject: Q3 Budget Review
body: Attached is the preliminary budget deck for Q3. Please review slide 4 specifically—I think the projections are a bit optimistic.

subject: AC in Server Room
body: Security just pinged me saying the temp in the server room is rising. Is the AC unit broken again? We need facilities there ASAP.

subject: Phishing email??
body: I just got an email from 'CEO' asking for gift cards. Pretty sure this is spam but wanted to double-check before I delete it.

subject: Wi-Fi is terrible today
body: Is anyone else having issues with the guest network? Client can't connect and we have a demo in 20 minutes.

subject: Jira access for the intern
body: Hey, can we get Sarah (new intern) added to the Engineering board on Jira? She can't see the backlog.

subject: Expense report rejected
body: Hi Finance, my travel expense report was rejected because of a missing receipt, but I attached it on page 3. Can you take another look?

subject: Slack integration failing
body: The bot that posts deployment updates to Slack has stopped working. It’s annoying but not critical. Take a look when you can.

subject: FW: Client Complaint - Latency
body: See below. The guys at Acme Corp are saying the dashboard takes 10+ seconds to load. This is the third time they've complained this week.

subject: Printer on 3rd floor
body: Paper jam in the big Xerox machine on the 3rd floor. I tried to fix it but I think I made it worse. Sorry!

subject: Prod DB CPU at 99%
body: Alerts are firing off. The primary database CPU is pegged at 99%. Looks like a bad query from the new release. Rolling back now?

subject: Happy Hour this Thursday!
body: Hey team, we're heading to O'Reilly's after work on Thursday to celebrate the launch. First round is on me!

subject: Need admin rights
body: I'm trying to install Docker for the new project but I don't have admin privileges on this laptop. Can someone remote in?

subject: Missing monitor cable
body: I just moved to the new desk but I can't find an HDMI cable for the second monitor. Does IT have spares?

subject: Payroll discrepancy
body: Hi HR, I think my overtime from last weekend wasn't calculated in this month's slip. Can we discuss?

subject: Security patch compliance
body: Action required: All employees must restart their machines by EOD to apply the latest OS security patch. Do not ignore.

subject: Website typo
body: Small thing - there is a typo on the 'About Us' page. It says 'profesional' instead of 'professional'. Can marketing fix it?

subject: VPN down?
body: I can't access the internal wiki from home. Is the VPN gateway acting up or is it just my internet?

subject: Key card not working
body: My badge isn't opening the side door anymore. It works on the main entrance though. Weird. Can you reset it?

subject: Left my charger
body: Did anyone see a Mac charger in Conference Room B? I think I left it there after the stand-up.

subject: AWS Bill spike
body: Who spun up the extra GPU instances in us-east-1? The forecasted bill just jumped by $2k. We need to shut these down if not in use.

subject: Sick leave
body: Hi team, waking up with a fever today. Taking a sick day. I'll be checking emails sporadically.

subject: Meeting reschedule
body: So sorry, but can we push our 1:1 to tomorrow? A client fire drill just came up.

subject: New coffee machine instructions
body: Please read the instructions before using the new espresso machine. Someone already jammed the capsule slot.

subject: API tokens expired
body: Our integration with the payment provider failed last night. Looks like the API tokens expired. We need to rotate them immediately.

subject: Clean desk policy reminder
body: Just a friendly reminder to clear your desks before leaving on Friday. The cleaning crew can't wipe down cluttered surfaces.

subject: Laptop battery swollen
body: My trackpad is popping out and the laptop isn't sitting flat. I think the battery is swollen. Is this dangerous?

subject: FW: Vendor Contract
body: Forwarding the revised contract from the vendor. Legal needs to sign off on the liability clause before we proceed.

subject: Git merge conflict hell
body: I messed up the merge on the 'feature-login' branch. Can a senior dev help me untangle this mess?

subject: Unidentified person in lobby
body: There is a guy in the lobby asking for 'Steve' but won't say which Steve. He doesn't have an appointment. Security?

subject: Code freeze dates
body: Reminder: Code freeze for the holiday release starts next Monday. Get your PRs in by Friday afternoon.

subject: Broken chair
body: The gas lift on my chair is broken, it keeps sinking. Can I swap it with one from the empty cubicle?

subject: Feedback on design mockups
body: I added some comments to the Figma file. Overall looks great, just some tweaks on the font size.

subject: Fire drill testing
body: Heads up: We will be testing the fire alarm system tomorrow at 11 AM. It will be loud.

subject: Data breach in news
body: Did you see the news about our competitor getting hacked? We should probably double-check our own logs just to be safe.

subject: Timesheets!!
body: Folks, half the team hasn't submitted timesheets yet. Payroll runs tomorrow. Please do this NOW.

subject: Re: Quarterly Goals
body: I think the target for Q3 is too aggressive given the current headcount. Let's discuss in the weekly sync.

subject: SSL Certificate Warning
body: Users are reporting a 'Not Secure' warning when visiting the landing page. Did the SSL cert auto-renew fail?

subject: Parking spot dispute
body: Someone keeps parking in my assigned spot (Bay 42). It's a blue Ford. Can we send a blast email?

subject: Who has the test device?
body: Who has the test iPad? I need to QA the mobile build. It's not in the device lab.

subject: Lunch & Learn: AI Tools
body: Join us next Wednesday for a session on how to use the new AI coding assistants. Pizza provided.

subject: CRM is crawling
body: Salesforce is loading incredibly slowly today. It's taking 2 minutes to save a lead. Is this a known issue?

subject: Out of office contact
body: I'm out on vacation for the next two weeks. Please reach out to Mark for any urgent urgent deliverables.

subject: Spilled water on laptop
body: Major fail. I knocked a glass of water onto my keyboard. Turned it off immediately. What do I do?

subject: Inventory check
body: We need to do a hardware inventory next week. Please bring all company devices (phones, tablets) to the IT desk.

subject: Late for standup
body: Train is stuck between stations. Will be 15 mins late for the morning standup. Start without me.

subject: Re: User retention stats
body: The numbers in this report don't match what I see in Google Analytics. Are we filtering out internal traffic?

subject: Mouse battery dead
body: Does the supply closet have AA batteries? My mouse just died.

subject: Deployment failed - rollback
body: The v2.4 deployment failed health checks. Automated rollback initiated. We need a post-mortem on this.

subject: Customer requesting refund
body: Ticket #9928: Customer is very angry about the downtime and demanding a full refund. Need a manager to step in.

subject: Tax documents
body: Where can I download my W2 form? The HR portal link seems broken.

subject: Microwave smell
body: Someone burnt popcorn in the kitchen microwave again. The whole floor smells like burnt toast. Please be careful!

subject: Update your drivers
body: PSA: If you are experiencing screen flickering, please update your graphics drivers. The fix was pushed yesterday.

subject: Lost badge
body: I think I dropped my badge on the bus. Can you deactivate it just in case?

subject: Backup tapes
body: Are we still rotating physical backup tapes or is everything cloud now? Found a box of tapes in the archive room.

subject: Can't find the shared folder
body: I have access to the 'Marketing' drive, but I can't see the '2024 Assets' folder. Did it get moved?

subject: Phishing test results
body: Results from the fake phishing campaign are in... 15% of you clicked the link. We need to schedule more training.

subject: New feature idea
body: Had a crazy idea for the dashboard widget. Can we grab coffee for 10 mins to brainstorm?

subject: Toilet plumbing issue
body: The men's restroom on the 2nd floor is flooding. Water is coming out into the hallway. Urgent.

subject: Domain renewal
body: The domain name for the microsite expires in 3 days. Who has the credit card for the registrar?

subject: Teams vs Zoom
body: Are we officially switching to Teams? I have invites on both platforms and it's confusing.

subject: Project X timeline
body: We are slipping on the timeline for Project X. We need to cut scope if we want to hit the launch date.

subject: Congrats to the sales team!
body: Big shout out to the sales team for closing the massive deal with TechCorp! Drinks on Friday?

subject: Noise cancelling headphones
body: Is it within policy to expense noise-cancelling headphones? The open office is getting really loud.

subject: Server rack cleanup
body: The cabling in Rack 4 is a spaghetti mess. Planning a cleanup this Saturday. Anyone want to help?

subject: Wrong attachment
body: Oops, ignore the previous email. I attached the wrong file. Here is the correct version.

subject: API Rate Limiting
body: We are hitting the rate limits on the Twitter API. The social feed widget is blank. Can we upgrade the plan?

subject: Visitor Wi-Fi password
body: Hey, what's the current password for the guest Wi-Fi? I forgot it again.

subject: Flu shots
body: HR is organizing free flu shots in the conference room next Tuesday. Sign up sheet is at reception.

subject: Need vector logo
body: Does anyone have the high-res vector file of the company logo? The one on the drive is a pixelated JPEG.

subject: System maintenance notice
body: Scheduled maintenance: The ERP system will be down from 2 AM to 4 AM on Sunday.

subject: Missing invoice #402
body: Vendor is chasing payment for invoice #402. Accounts Payable says they never received it. Can you resend?

subject: App crashing on iOS 17
body: QA just found a crash that only happens on iOS 17. Looks like a memory leak. Priority High.

subject: Reference check
body: A former employee, John Doe, listed you as a reference. Are you comfortable taking a call about him?

subject: Broken link in newsletter
body: The marketing newsletter just went out and the main CTA link is 404ing. Can we set up a redirect fast?

subject: Team building activity
body: Poll: For the team offsite, do we prefer bowling or an escape room?

subject: Access to Analytics
body: I need read-access to the production Google Analytics property for the monthly report. My email is attached.

subject: Suspicious login - Russia
body: Security Alert: Successful login detected from an IP in Russia on the admin account. Verifying if this is a VPN or a breach.

subject: Monitor flickering
body: My external monitor keeps going black for a few seconds. I tried changing cables but it persists.

subject: Courier package
body: Reception: A package arrived for you, looks like hardware. Please pick it up.

subject: Re: Budget cuts
body: I understand we need to save money, but cutting the cloud budget will impact site performance. Can we reconsider?

subject: Treadmill desk
body: The treadmill desk is making a squeaking noise. It's distracting. Can we get some WD-40?

subject: API Documentation
body: The API docs on the wiki are severely outdated. I just wasted 2 hours trying to use a deprecated endpoint.

subject: Meeting room squatters
body: People are staying in Conference Room A way past their booking time. Can we enforce the schedule?

subject: Holiday gift swap
body: We are organizing a Secret Santa! Limit is $20. Reply if you want to join.

subject: VPN certificate error
body: Getting a 'certificate verify failed' error when connecting to the VPN. Is there a new config file?

subject: Emergency contact update
body: Please ensure your emergency contact details are up to date in the HR portal.

subject: Cloud storage full
body: We've reached 90% of our allocated S3 storage. We need to archive old logs or buy more space.

subject: Recycling bins
body: Please stop putting food waste in the paper recycling bins. It ruins the whole batch.

subject: Beta testing help
body: We need 5 volunteers to test the new mobile app build before we ship to the store. Any takers?

subject: Forgot my badge... again
body: I'm stuck in the lobby. I left my badge at home. Can someone come sign me in?

subject: Staging environment down
body: I can't deploy to Staging. It says 'Disk Full'. Can DevOps clean up the old docker images?

subject: Vendor meeting agenda
body: Here is the agenda for the call with the software vendor. Let me know if I missed anything.

subject: Incorrect billing address
body: The invoice has the old office address. Can you ask them to update it and reissue?

subject: SQL Injection attempt
body: WAF blocked a massive SQL injection attack last night. Logs look clean but we should review the code.

subject: Retrospective notes
body: Thanks for the honest feedback in the retro. I've compiled the action items here.
